Products

Static Grass 2mm 50ml.

 Mini-Nature 2mm Static Grass is designed for it´s application in Wargaming and models on scales close to 1:50 or smaller.

  • Autunm
  • Winter
  • Spring
  • Summer
  • Savannah & Sunburnt (Por separado / Separately)
  • Yellow
  • Red & Dark Red (Por separado / Separately)

Static Grass 4mm 50ml.

 Like the rest of our products, Mini-Nature 4mm Static Grass has multiple applications, for example, creating classic grass toufts.

  • Autunm
  • Winter
  • Spring
  • Summer
  • Savannah
  • Sunburnt
  • Red & Dark Red (Por separado / Separately)

Static Grass 6mm 50ml.

 Someone forgot to mow the lawn! 6mm Static Grass has various applications, both for 1:16 figures, as for figures surrounding 1:48 scale.

  • Autunm
  • Winter
  • Spring
  • Summer
  • Savannah & Sunburnt (Por separado / Separately)
  • Yellow
  • Red & Dark Red (Por separado / Separately)

Static Grass 10mm 50ml.

 Our 10mm Static Grass is ideal for it´s application in models and figures which scale is greater than 1:32. Acrylic paint adheres perfectly to the Mini-Nature pasture.

  • Autunm
  • Winter
  • Spring
  • Summer
  • Green
  • Spring

Ballast 50ml.

 Ballast is commonly used as crushed stones or gravel in figures and dioramas. Available in Large (L), Medium (M) and Small (S) for it´s use in different modelling scales.

  • Light Brown (L, M & S)
  • Brown (L, M & S)
  • Gray (L, M & S)
  • Black (L, M & S)
  • River (L)

Líquen 100ml.

 A favorite within the hobby. I'ts unique texture blends easily in landscape. Usually used as shrub, tree foliage, and cover for any terrain on any scale.

  • Natural (N)
  • Pale Green (PG)
  • Light Green (LG)
  • Medium Green (MG)
  • Dark Green (DG)
  • Autumn Mix (AM)
